text: James Burgess Greene (April 8, 1876 - June 30, 1962) was an American swimmer. He competed in the men's 1500 metre freestyle event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1962 deaths Category:American male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of the United States Category:Swimmers at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: James Greene (swimmer)
